item.description: Whatâ€™s #NaNoWriMo? â€œWHAT? 50k words?!â€ What Iâ€™m Planning to Write About Lightning Fast FAQs Whatâ€™s Next? Whatâ€™s #NaNoWriMo? National Novel Writing Month is an event that was started by Chris Baty in July 1999. Since its humble beginnings with 21 participants back then, it has grown into a global phenomenon with several hundred thousand people doing it every year during November.
